name: Match Master 3D - Tile Match
description:
Can you match 3D objects? Match Master is the #1 pair matching game with challenging levels and 3D graphics.

Find the identical 3D objects, match 3 to make them pop, remove all the objects on the ground before the time is over. With unique design and an ever-changing array of 3D objects, Match Master puts a colorfully creative spin on classic match-three gameplay!

Match Master Features:
- Hundreds of well-designed challenging levels
- Easy to learn but difficult to master
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous 3D visual effects
- Autosave, continue playing where you left off
- Dozens of cute stuffs: fruits, cakes, animals, toys and much more!
